mutants.code:
def minimum_one_bit_operations(n: int) -> int:
    s = 1
    m = n
    while m:
        s += m & 1
        m >>= 1
    k = 1
    while s:
        s -= bool(n & k)
        n ^= s & 1 and k
        k <<= 1
    return n
